intro: Anderbergia rooibergensis, commonly known as the Rooiberg sandthorn, is a shrub native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its slender, spiny stems and small, yellowish-green flowers. The plant thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found on rocky soils. Its leaves are typically small and succulent, adapted to conserve water. Anderbergia rooibergensis plays a role in stabilizing soil in its native habitat and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
